rewrite1:
For the fourth paragraph, please set it to Outline Level 6. Make sure to unbold the entire paragraph and switch the font to Calibri. Additionally, adjust the spacing to include a 1.5 cm gap following the paragraph.

Turning to the first paragraph, implement a line spacing of 1.5 lines, ensure that all bold formatting is cleared, and align the text to the right. Also, please reduce the font size to 8 points.

Lastly, in the fifth paragraph, the text should not be bold. Change the indentation to a 6 pt hanging indent and alter the font color to Indigo. Apply a dotted underline for added emphasis.
